thread.title: Check out Huawei's skinny metal powerhouse Mate S (pictures)
thread.title_full: Check out Huawei's skinny metal powerhouse Mate S (pictures)

title: Check out Huawei's skinny metal powerhouse Mate S (pictures)
text:
Check out Huawei's skinny metal powerhouse Mate S (pictures) We take an up close look at Huawei's latest metal superphone, the Mate S. Read Less 
The Mate S has a 5.5-inch AMOLED display that extends almost to either side of the handset. According to Huawei it takes up 73 percent of the Mate S's front face. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
The all-metal skin comes in mystic champagne and titanium grey. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
The main camera has a 13-megapixel resolution. Next to the lens around back is a dual-LED flash. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
Like on the Huawei Ascend Mate 7 there's a fingerprint sensor just below the lens for unlocking the phone. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
We can never resist taking a smartphone's camera for a spin. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
Personalize the display with a variety of themes. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
All of the features run on Android 5.0 Lollipop. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
On the bottom end are speakers and the Micro-USB/charger port. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
Flip the Mate S on its side to show off the slim 7.2mm profile. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German 
Browse through the Mate S's Settings menu to adjust features to your liking. Published: September 2, 2015 7:04 AM PDT Photo by: Andrew Hoyle/CNET / Caption by: Kent German Hot Galleries
